page.title: 16CYCLING PROFICIENCY
page.content: After school,some 30 fourth years go to this club.It is held in summer when weather and daylight hours are most suitable.It is run by a local policeman and 3 teachers.We are tested on our cycling and knowledge of the Highway Code at the end. Our bikes are tested to make sure that brakes work,seats are the right height,chain tension correct.We learn to balance,make an emergency stop,approach a junction and turn right and go round a round_about.They make us safer cyclists and cut down accidents.We use our bikes locally,but because they give little protection from weather or other traffic and are slow and often tiring,they may become obsolete.
